name: HEAD MODE
description:
Viewers/players are tasked variously with improving their street survival skills, making it rain bitcoins on plebs, and preserving their genes. Contributions to this tongue-in-cheek critique of a middling middle-class’ priorities have been made by various other artists as well as a tax lawyer.

Game by Paul Timings. Sound contributions from Dharma Shan (prepared guitar), and samples from Yong Yandsen (saxophone) and Kok Siew-Wai (vocals). And of course, the dulcet tones of Alex Carr.

Controls are as follows:

  • for 'street survival': WASD or arrows to manoeuvre past the street people.
  • for 'make it rain': WASD/arrows to move and mouse to make it rain. Like a FPS.
  • for 'the bureaucrat': point and click on one of the three options.
  • for 'sperm count': mouse to click on the sperm, thus sperminating your competition.
